channel.title: COVID-19 on Computational Uncertainty Lab
channel.description: Recent content in COVID-19 on Computational Uncertainty Lab

item.title: An expert judgment model to predict early stages of the COVID-19 outbreak in the United States
item.description: This work highlights the importance that an expert linear pool could play in flexibly assessing a wide array of risks early in future emerging outbreaks, especially in settings where available data cannot yet support data-driven computational modeling.
